replace row 65 with border row pattern repeat row stitch count r36 double_crochet r6 145 r37 shells & chains r7 13 shells & 12 ch5sp r38 double_crochet extra chs r8 13 fans & 24 ch2sp r39 double_crochet chs r9 157 r40 double_crochet r10 161 r41 cross clusters r5 165 r42 double_crochet r6 169 r43 shells & chains r7 15 shells & 14 ch5sp r44 double_crochet extra chs r8 15 fans & 28 ch2sp r45 double_crochet chs r9 181 r46 double_crochet r10 185 r47 cross clusters r5 189 r48 double_crochet r6 193 r49 shells & chains r7 17 shells & 16 ch5sp r50 double_crochet extra chs r8 17 fans & 32 ch2sp r51 double_crochet chs r9 233 r52 double_crochet r10 209 r53 cross clusters r5 213 r54 double_crochet r6 217 r55 shells & chains r7 19 shells & 18 ch5sp r56 double_crochet extra chs r8 19 fans & 36 ch2sp r57 double_crochet chs r9 261 r58 double_crochet r10 233 r59 cross clusters r5 237 r60 double_crochet r6 241 r61 shells & chains r7 21 shells & 20 ch5sp r62 double_crochet extra chs r8 21 fans & 40 ch2sp r63 double_crochet chs r9 289 r64 double_crochet r10 257 r65 border replaces r5 repeat 263 for a larger shawl continue repeating row 5-10 a the border row will work on r5 repeats going forward stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 11 border the final border row replaces the row 5 repeat at the end of the pattern a yarn over & insert hook in next stitch b pull up a loop 3 loops on hook c yarn over again d insert hook in same stitch & pull up a loop 5 loops on hook e repeat last twice more 9 loops on hook vpuff puff ch1 puff f yarn over & pull through all nine loops on hook in same stitch g chain one to close the puff h in same stitch repeat steps a-g row 65 | side count 263sts total 65 vpuffs per side ch3 2dc 1sc skip 1 vpuff skip 1 *repeat until second to last stitch of side skip last st 1sc vpuff 1sc skip 1 vpuff skip 1 1sc *until second to last stitch of side 3dc in last st note the diagram is only showing how to start the row the repeating pattern and how to end the row if on row 65 there will be a total of 263 stitches per side stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 12 stretchy toes inspiration this shawl was inspired by our many lazy cats and their very satisfying yet remarkably difficult to catch on camera stretchy & spready toes www huskyberry com crochet@huskyberry com www pinterest com/huskyberry_crochet
